alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 1:51PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Weld County through 230 PM MDT... At 150 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles east of Milton Reservoir, or 16 miles southeast of Greeley, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Keenesburg, Prospect Valley and Roggen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
